actions.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To extend the authority to compute hourly rates of basic pay of employees for the Federal Government in the manner provided in the Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1982.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1982 to extend the authority to compute hourly rates of pay for Federal employees as provided by such Act through FY 1986.

titles.title: To extend the authority to compute hourly rates of basic pay of employees for the Federal Government in the manner provided in the Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1982.
